summary: A group of cheerleaders become the targets of an unknown killer at a remote summer camp.
cast: Betsy Russell|Leif Garrett|Lucinda Dickey|Lorie Griffin|George 'Buck' Flower|Travis McKenna|Teri Weigel|Rebecca Ferratti|Vickie Benson|Jeff Prettyman|Krista Pflanzer|Craig Piligian|William Johnson|Kathryn Litton|Tommy Habeeb|John Quinn|Chris Prettyman|Mike Knox|Frank Reinfield|Dave Delgado|Noah Helpern
title: Animadoras asesinas
